mapper.select: SELECT signup_activity.actID, response, payment FROM signup_activity,activity where userID = #{userID} and signup_activity.actID = activity.actID and activity.startDate > #{date}

SELECT activity.actID, COUNT(userID) as userJoinedNum, title, startDate, location, price, capacity, imgs, additionalInfoJSON, description FROM signup_activity RIGHT JOIN activity ON activity.actID = signup_activity.actID WHERE activity.startDate > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY activity.actID, title, startDate, location, price, capacity, imgs, additionalInfoJSON, description ORDER BY activity.actID ASC

SELECT activity.actID, title, startDate, location FROM signup_activity RIGHT JOIN activity ON activity.actID = signup_activity.actID WHERE signup_activity.userId = #{userID} ORDER BY activity.actID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET userJoinedNum=#{userJoinedNum} WHERE actID =#{actID}
mapper.select: SELECT startDate,userJoinedNum,capacity FROM activity where actID = #{actID}
SELECT email,nickname FROM user WHERE userID = #{userID}
